long_description: Uncle Sam wants you to go climbing! Get patriotic while you're scaling big walls or working on a route at the sport climbing crag with the Metolius Uncle Sam Chalk Bag. Pile fleece lining is soft to the touch. Small loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Metolius Uncle Sam Chalk Bag includes a webbing belt with side-release buckle.
short_description: Uncle Sam wants you to go climbing! Get patriotic while you're scaling big walls or working on a route at the sport climbing crag with the Metolius Uncle Sam Chalk Bag.
